parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attaches a vehicle [[Object]] to the given [[Waypoint]].
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Use this command to associate a transport with <tt>"GETIN"</tt> waypoint, other types of waypoints might work or might not. If you have different type of waypoint to start with, make it a <tt>"GETIN"</tt> type with [[setWaypointType]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint [[waypointAttachVehicle]] vehicleName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[waypointAttachVehicle]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>(([[waypoints]] [[player]]) [[select]] 0) [[waypointAttachVehicle]] _soldier1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointDescription]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[currentWaypoint]], [[attachObject]], [[attachTo]], [[attachedObjects]], [[attachedTo]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[triggerAttachVehicle]], [[attachedObject]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 4, 2019 - 22:36 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Erentar|Erentar]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Attaches a [[Waypoint]] to the given [[vehicle]] or [[units|unit]]. Attached waypoint automatically follows the vehicle/unit it is attached to. 
</dd>
</dl>
